title: Roses and Chains
description: A book in the 1-800-DOM-help series.Take one adorable suburban couple just starting to realize their D/s relationship isn’t quite enough to satisfy. Add one cute and quirky sub who can’t seem to find a Dom to suit her tastes. Place them in a room full of sex toys and candlelight, roses and chains…And after a few smoking-hot nights of pleasure and exploration, all three just might find what they’re looking for.
author: Delphine Dryden
